response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation of its unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. For this exceptional opportunity, I am offering the product to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This price reflects not only the high quality and value of the product but also the potential long-term benefits it could bring to your endeavors. I am confident that you will find the investment worthwhile. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier solution.", "product_price": 12000}
